text: Allahale sarvottama vani avatarita gareko cha juna yasto kitaba ho jasaka ayataharu apasama mildachan, ra dohorya'inchan, juna manisaharu aphno palanakartasita dara manchan, tyasabata uniharuko sariraka raunharu darale thado hunchan, antama unako sarira ra hrdaya allahako varnanako lagi narama ra tyasa tarpha pravrtta hunchan. Yo allahako margadarsana ho, tyasabata usale jasala'i cahancha sojho margama hinda'umcha, ra jasala'i allahale pathavicalita garidincha, usako nimti kohi margadarsaka humdaina
